Hive Metastore destinationevent generationevent generationHive Metastore destinationThe Hive Metastore destination can generate events that you can use in an event stream. When you enable event generation, the destination creates event records each time it updates the Hive metastore, including when it creates a table, adds columns, or creates a partition. Updates to existing tables, columns and partitions are treated as creates since the destination does not change or delete existing structures. Hive Metastore events can be used as follows:
With the Hive Query executor to run Hive or Impala queries after updating the Hive metastore.
